I

idata - Variable in class IrcEvent
additional integer data associated with the event, if any.
identify() - Method in class IrcSession
Sends a Nickserv Identify command, if a password is set.
initialize(IrcSession, IrcBot, IrcPluginManager) - Method in class IrcPlugin
Method used by the Plugin Manager to set instance fields in the plugin [to provide control to the plugin] during loading.
interpret(String) - Method in class IrcCommand
Tokenize, and determine property values from a given IRC Command string
interpret(String) - Method in class IrcOrigin
Tokenize the origin string and set object properties
IrcBot - Class in irtrusbot
Class implementing the skeleton of controllable IRC bot or client with plugin support.
IrcBot() - Constructor for class IrcBot
Constructs the object and sets any important instance information in contained objects.
IrcCommand - Class in irtrusbot
IRC Command class.
IrcCommand(String) - Constructor for class IrcCommand
Create an IRC Command object with properties interpreted from an IRC Command string.
IrcDirection - Enum in irtrusbot
An Enumeration describing whether a message of interest is being sent, received, or internally simulated.
IrcEvent - Class in irtrusbot
A class that describes an event occurring in the IrcBot/client processing - ranging from connection state changes to received data
IrcEvent(IrcEventType, IrcState, IrcState, IrcCommand) - Constructor for class IrcEvent
Constructs an Event from type, state, and command information Note: attempts automatic interpretation of IRC Commands to Messages if applicable.
IrcEventAction - Enum in irtrusbot
Enumeration describing what action should be taken on a processed IrcEvent message This value is returned by plugin eventHandlers.
IrcEventType - Enum in irtrusbot
Enumeration describing the type of event propagated to the plugin handler.
IrcLoginState - Enum in irtrusbot
Enumeration describing the state of the login process as used by IrcSession methods.
IrcMessage - Class in irtrusbot
IRC Privmsg/Notice class.
IrcMessage(IrcCommand) - Constructor for class IrcMessage
Interprets an IRC message (PRIVMSG) object from an generic IRC Command object.
IrcMessage(IrcOrigin, String, String) - Constructor for class IrcMessage
Creates an IRC message (PRIVMSG) object from details about a message received or to be sent.
IrcMessageCommandException - Exception in irtrusbot
Exception for IRC Commands incompatible with IrcMessage constructors.
IrcMessageCommandException(String) - Constructor for exception IrcMessageCommandException
 
IrcOrigin - Class in irtrusbot
IRC origin/user information class.
IrcOrigin(String) - Constructor for class IrcOrigin
Create an Origin information object from an origin/sender string [taken from an incoming command]
IrcOrigin(String, String, String) - Constructor for class IrcOrigin
Create an Origin information object from discrete parts of User sender information strings
IrcPlugin - Class in irtrusbot
Skeleton/parent class for all IrcBot plugins If you are writing your own plugin, your plugin class should extend IrcPlugin and provide an override of the handleEvent() method.
IrcPlugin() - Constructor for class IrcPlugin
 
IrcPluginManager - Class in irtrusbot
Class used for managing and communicating with various plugins
IrcPluginManager(IrcBot) - Constructor for class IrcPluginManager
Construct the class and include an instance of the Bot constructing it
IrcSession - Class in irtrusbot
Class maintaining information and useful actions pertaining to a client session connected to a server.
IrcSession() - Constructor for class IrcSession
Create an IRC Session instance - specific to one client/user.
IrcState - Enum in irtrusbot
Enumeration describing the current state of an IrcBot instance and connection
irtrusbot - package irtrusbot
 
IrtrusBot - Class in irtrusbot
Main bot class, used to load the Bot, plugins, and run the poll loop.
IrtrusBot() - Constructor for class IrtrusBot
 
isConnected() - Method in class IrcSession
Determine if the session is currently connected to the IRC Server
isIdented - Variable in class IrcOrigin
State whether or not the user sending the message successfully used IDENTd
isMessageValidLength() - Method in class IrcMessage
Determines if the message length is within IRC limitations.
isNumeric - Variable in class IrcCommand
State whether or not the command type is numeric
isServer - Variable in class IrcOrigin
State whether or not the message was sent by an IRC Server (has server property set)
isType(String) - Method in class IrcCommand
Determines of the given type string is the same as the current command type
isUser - Variable in class IrcOrigin
State whether or not the message was sent by a User (has nick,user,host and isIdented properties set)
